12.26.18  2:06 am   how do you deal with feeling overwhelmed?

12.26.18  1:59 am   i must say that i think the "i just did a bad thing" videos is one of your strongest visual offerings. i listened to the song a *lot* in the week between when it came out and when the music video came out, and the video still managed to add to the thoughts the song generates in my brain. it was totally worth the extra week to make it the way that it ended up being.

Would you consider making the schedule more flexible to accommodate the extra time that ends up needing to go into certain things?

      You've mentioned things like releasing songs/videos on every other tuesday and anything videos on the other tuesday, but I would support a more low-key thing where the deadline was that you had to release *something* every tuesday,

      but depending on what ended up getting finished,

      it could either be a song, music video, and 30-second anything video, or just a 5-second anything video.

12.25.18  6:57 pm   Alright, maybe I'm just stupid, or maybe I'm anxious and depressed and hypervigilant, but your recent song set off a few red flags, per se.  This is less of a question and more just a kinda I dunno, really.  Asking "are you OK" and expecting a genuine like "oh yeah that's a cry for help i'm suicidal" is... not gonna work, and that's patronizing as you're probably in your late twenties to early thirties; you're a big boy who can answer big boy questions and do big boy things by himself.  But I guess just... if you're struggling, please look into seeing a therapist or a psychiatrist.  I love your content and I think you're a pretty damn swell guy.  I would hate to think that you're not doing well and maybe did "a bad thing" if that "bad thing" is what I think it is.

12.25.18  6:43 pm   what are some tips for analyzing jazz harmony for the sake of consistency? I have a hard time with V7/IV for example, i dont know if i should just start writing them I7  but sacrifice the "ii-V-I" in the analysis by not using IV as reference. I think there may be different ways to write them down depending on if i want to learn whats going on, or if i want to be able to read it quickly in any key.
